slide.title: Brushes and Styles
slide.blurb: When drawing on a canvas, by default the brush is a single pixel of the selected color. However another canvas can be used as a brush (allowing you to define custom brushes for the GD drawing functions.

Styles like brushes allow you to change the way the standard GD drawing functions render. However, unlike brushes styles are defined by creating a pattern (represented as an array) instead of a canvas.
